languages.text: "Дружба — непозволительная роскошь для людей его положения и желанная уязвимость для Губительных сил".
"For individuals of Evayne's standing, friendship is an unacceptable luxury and a vulnerability that the Ruinous Powers are only too eager to exploit."
languages.original_text: "Дружба — непозволительная роскошь для людей его положения и желанная уязвимость для Губительных сил".

traits.locale_text: "For individuals of Evayne's standing, friendship is an unacceptable luxury and a vulnerability that the Ruinous Powers are only too eager to exploit."

"For individuals of Evayne's standing, friendship is an unacceptable luxury and a vulnerability that the Ruinous Powers are only too eager to exploit."

languages.text: "Für Personen von Evaynes Stand ist Freundschaft ein inakzeptabler Luxus und eine Schwachstelle, die die Mächte der Zerstörung nur zu gerne ausnutzen."
languages.original_text: "For individuals of Evayne's standing, friendship is an unacceptable luxury and a vulnerability that the Ruinous Powers are only too eager to exploit."

traits.locale_text: "Für Personen von Evaynes Stand ist Freundschaft ein inakzeptabler Luxus und eine Schwachstelle, die die Mächte der Zerstörung nur zu gerne ausnutzen."

languages.text: « Pour des individus de sa stature, l'amitié est un luxe inacceptable, et une vulnérabilité que les Puissances de la Ruine ne sont que trop promptes à exploiter. »
languages.original_text: "For individuals of Evayne's standing, friendship is an unacceptable luxury and a vulnerability that the Ruinous Powers are only too eager to exploit."

traits.locale_text: « Pour des individus de sa stature, l'amitié est un luxe inacceptable, et une vulnérabilité que les Puissances de la Ruine ne sont que trop promptes à exploiter. »

languages.text: «Para alguien del estatus de Evayne, la amistad es un lujo inaceptable, una vulnerabilidad que los Poderes Ruinosos explotan con sumo gusto».
languages.original_text: "For individuals of Evayne's standing, friendship is an unacceptable luxury and a vulnerability that the Ruinous Powers are only too eager to exploit."

traits.locale_text: «Para alguien del estatus de Evayne, la amistad es un lujo inaceptable, una vulnerabilidad que los Poderes Ruinosos explotan con sumo gusto».

languages.text: 「エヴァインのような地位の人間にとって、友情は信じられないほどの贅沢であり、〈禍つ神々〉が利用しようとしている弱点なのだ」
languages.original_text: "For individuals of Evayne's standing, friendship is an unacceptable luxury and a vulnerability that the Ruinous Powers are only too eager to exploit."

traits.locale_text: 「エヴァインのような地位の人間にとって、友情は信じられないほどの贅沢であり、〈禍つ神々〉が利用しようとしている弱点なのだ」

languages.text: “对艾维尼这样的人而言，友谊是无法负担的奢侈品，也是毁灭之力渴望利用的弱点。”
languages.original_text: "For individuals of Evayne's standing, friendship is an unacceptable luxury and a vulnerability that the Ruinous Powers are only too eager to exploit."

traits.locale_text: “对艾维尼这样的人而言，友谊是无法负担的奢侈品，也是毁灭之力渴望利用的弱点。”

languages.original_text: "For individuals of Evayne's standing, friendship is an unacceptable luxury and a vulnerability that the Ruinous Powers are only too eager to exploit."

languages.text: "Evayne'in statüsündeki bireyler için arkadaşlık; Yıkıcı Güçler'in sömürmeye son derece hevesli olduğu, kabul edilemez bir lüks ve zayıflıktır."
languages.original_text: "For individuals of Evayne's standing, friendship is an unacceptable luxury and a vulnerability that the Ruinous Powers are only too eager to exploit."
